keyword: how many calories are in tuna fish salad
title: How Many Calories Are in Tuna Fish Salad?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in tuna fish salad per serving, including protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and easy recipe tweaks for lighter options.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Tuna Fish Salad?
assumptions: Standard recipe: canned tuna in water (drained), mixed with mayonnaise, celery, and onion; 1 serving = 1/2 cup (approx. 100g).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, tuna type (water/oil-packed), mayo brand, added ingredients, and portion size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One serving of tuna fish salad contains about 190 kcal and 13 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1/4 cup diced celery and carrots

faqs.q: How many calories are in tuna fish salad per serving?
faqs.a: About 190 kcal for one 1/2 cup serving of standard tuna fish salad.

faqs.q: What's the protein in tuna fish salad?
faqs.a: Approximately 13 g protein per serving, mainly from the tuna.

faqs.q: Does tuna fish salad have a lot of fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 14 g total fat per serving, mostly from mayonnaise; opt for low-fat versions to reduce.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in tuna fish salad?
faqs.a: About 400 mg per serving, from canned tuna; choose low-sodium tuna to lower it.

faqs.q: Can I make tuna fish salad lower calorie?
faqs.a: Yes, use light mayo or Greek yogurt and add more veggies to cut calories by 40-50 kcal per serving.
